mapper.select: select waybill_id, o_id, emp_id, waybill_number from lms.ds_waybill_entrt where waybill_id = #{waybillId}
select waybill_id, o_id, emp_id, waybill_number from lms.ds_waybill_entrt limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into lms.ds_waybill_entrt(o_id, emp_id, waybill_number) values (#{oId}, #{empId}, #{waybillNumber})

insert into lms.ds_waybill_entrt(o_id, emp_id, waybill_number) values
(#{entity.oId}, #{entity.empId}, #{entity.waybillNumber})

insert into lms.ds_waybill_entrt(o_id, emp_id, waybill_number) values
(#{entity.oId}, #{entity.empId}, #{entity.waybillNumber})
on duplicate key update o_id = values(o_id) , emp_id = values(emp_id) , waybill_number = values(waybill_number)
mapper.update:
update lms.ds_waybill_entrt
o_id = #{oId},
emp_id = #{empId},
waybill_number = #{waybillNumber},
where waybill_id = #{waybillId}
